div.head: Notes
div.p: † This list of manuscripts was compiled using the following sources:
Courtenay, William J. Adam Wodeham: An Introduction to His Life and Writings (Leiden: Brill, 1978)
Stegmüller, Friedrich. Repertorium Commentariorum in Sententias Petri Lombardi, 2 vols. (Würzburg, 1947)

‡ This manuscript was only recently found by Chris Schabel. See Schabel, Chris. "The Sentences Commentary of Gerardus Odonis, OFM," in Bulletin de philosophie médiévale 46, (2004), 115-161. (The reference is on pages 128-129).
